metricsServer.title: Pod Horizontal Auto Scaling
metricsServer.description: Only displays Pod horizontal auto scaling policies bound to the current workload resource
metricsServer.targetCPUUsageDesc: When the actual CPU usage is greater/less than the target value, the system automatically reduces/increases the number of pod replicas.
metricsServer.targetMemoryUsageDesc: When the actual memory usage is greater/less than the target value, the system automatically reduces/increases the number of pod replicas.
metricsServer.minimumReplicasDesc: Set the minimum number of pod replicas allowed, with a default value of 1.
metricsServer.maximumReplicasDesc: Set the maximum number of pod replicas allowed, with a default value of 1.
metricsServer.empty.title: No found Pod Horizontal Auto Scaling
metricsServer.empty.description: Create a Pod Horizontal Auto Scaling.
metricsServer.field.name: Name
metricsServer.modal.create.title: Create Pod Horizontal Auto Scaling
